name: AoVR
description:
Oti's Attack on titan fan game built for vr. AoVR is a unique

 blend of realistic swing physics and fun mechanics. By being 

an "off rails" game the skill ceiling is truly limitless giving

 anybody the ability to master the mechanics of the ODM gear.

Being a game still in beta expect many updates to come.

Feel free to add any suggestions in the official discord : https://discord.gg/JqSEucMtQz  

Stay up to date with all upcoming updates : https://www.reddit.com/r/AttackOnVR/
